meanings.definition: A type of caterpillar that feeds on the leaves of trees.
meanings.sent1: The cankerworm crawled slowly along the tree branch.
meanings.sent2: The cankerworms were eating the leaves of the oak tree.
meanings.sent3: The cankerworm decided to have a leaf buffet on the maple tree.
meanings.sent4: The cankerworms were like tiny leaf-eating machines.
meanings.sent5: The cankerworms left a trail of bare branches behind them.

meanings.sent1: Neglect can cankerworm a friendship over time.
meanings.sent2: The disease can cankerworm the plant if left untreated.
meanings.sent3: Procrastination tends to cankerworm one's productivity.
meanings.sent4: Gossip can cankerworm a person's reputation.
meanings.sent5: The constant rain seemed to cankerworm the old roof.
